page.title: 03Town Council
page.content: She is the head of the town, so she has to make decisions concerning what's going to happen in Shifnal.Every month ,she has to go to a council meeting.She also goes to visit schools. Some of the Mayors particular concerns are litter,riding bikes on the pavement, and playground abuse. Repairs would cost Â£800,and in the play area it is hard to find something that has not been vandalized.But worst of all what would happen if an elderly person was knocked over by somebody riding on the pavement ? Shifnal has also been trying to get a swimming pool but sadly it was turned down when it reached the Shire Hall (county council).
